changelog: Version 2.8.0: Added dynamic PID Kp range (Kp Min/Kp Max) for Main Aimbot and Secondary Aimbot, with distance-based interpolation so Kp is no longer fixed at a single value. Version 2.7.0: Added PID axis speed multipliers (X/Y) for Main Aimbot and Secondary Aimbot to tune horizontal and vertical movement independently. Version 2.6.0: Added PID Controller mode for Main Aimbot and Secondary Aimbot, with configurable Kp/Ki/Kd and output clamp. Updated mode selector UI to display PID Controller ( RISK ). Version 2.5.2: Fixed UI style consistency for OptionMenu dropdown in Classic mode, and fixed update dialog actions by always showing Update Now/Open Release buttons with robust GitHub fallback links for main-branch update workflow. Version 2.5.1: Added GStreamer capture backend support for enhanced video capture capabilities. Version 2.4.2: Updated default configuration file from default.json to default_cvm.json, updated .gitignore to allow default_cvm.json tracking, and updated documentation. Version 2.4.1: Enhanced RGB Trigger processing and configuration, added custom RGB value support for personalized trigger settings. Version 2.4.0: Added Ferrum API support for keyboard and mouse control, enhanced UI with additional features, improved RGB Trigger functionality, and updated configuration options. Previous versions include: Config tab enhancements with DEL action and clipboard-driven import, ADS FOV feature with toggle/hold modes, config export/import functionality, HSV preview with eyedropper tool, and comprehensive mouse module refactoring.
